Text:
this is pretty much your last warning.
Please stop going around our domain blocks with these lame blog url attempts just to cash in from clicks. If you want to share torrents, then fine. If you want to just cash in from clicks then you are not welcome here.
If you fail to understand then first you will find yourself demoted and after that, if you still do not get the hint, you will be banned and all your torrents removed.
If you want a img host to post previews then here is one IMG host that is free and runned by TPB crew:

http://bayimg.com/

another one: 

http://imgbox.com/

There are more, these are just 2 examples.
I hope i make myself clear about this
I already registered on baying but it is not working for me. what i have to do to resolve this issue.
